name: Bigfoot: King of Crush
overview: Developed and published by Zoo, this follow-up to Bigfoot: Collision Course brings the realistic experience of monster truck racing to 4x4 fans and videogame enthusiasts alike. Crush cars and break records as Bigfoot comes to you larger than life in 3D! Unleash the power of Bigfoot as you demolish metal, shatter glass and win championships. Prove you're the baddest Bigfoot around, and the competition will be eatin' your dust!
